solution_line_template: Since {students_did_not_eat} students did not eat their animal crackers, {total_students} - {students_did_not_eat} = <<{total_students}-{students_did_not_eat}={students_who_ate}>>{students_who_ate} students ate their animal crackers.
The students ate a total of {students_who_ate} * {crackers_per_pack} =<<{students_who_ate}*{crackers_per_pack}={total_crackers_eaten}>>{total_crackers_eaten} animal crackers
